message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV

This paper proposes a new exploration strategy for deep reinforcement learning, which involves using Bayesian neural networks to maximize information gain about the agent's belief of environment dynamics. This approach falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI), as it involves training neural networks to learn and make decisions. Additionally, the paper focuses on continuous control tasks, which are often studied in the fields of robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper includes experiments with visual inputs, which suggests a potential application in computer vision (cs.CV).
